name: mayflower
content:

a bush that grows low on the ground in eastern parts of North America. It has white or pink flowers that smell very sweet: On May Day we always used to go to the pasture to pick mayflowers. The gardens have a display of mayflower and pines, flora representative of the region's inhabitants. Synonym
trailing arbutus
another name for
may : Grandma would never allow mayflowers in the house. The hedges were thick with mayflower.
